replies.author: Preston
replies.text: So he basically gave a speech that goes against everything he's been saying this entire time and people are acting like this is how it's always been!?

replies.author: Nolan
replies.text: Yeah I think he hired a really good speech writer, he doesn't care about any of that stuff. He just knows his supporters will love it , like they do in these comments and he's probably trying to get Bernie supports . But it ain't gonna work! Trump sucks.
